bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Hinson was a Methodist minister who spent most of his career pastoring churches in North Carolina.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The collection documenting the life and religious writings of O.I. Hinson consists of 45 handwritten sermons and outlines of sermons by Hinson, [ca. 1914]-1932; 20 letters written between 1937-1939 and 1946-1947, from Hinson to his brother, Jeremias Enos Hinson; a photograph of Hinson; and a small number of clippings and other miscellaneous papers.
